lines.text: [after the long opening zoom from outer space to the mouse hole]
I thought you'd never get here. Hey, Babbit! The people are here! They got here! There they are!

[Has hypnotized Catsello]
You are in my power. Pick up that mallet.
[Catsello picks up the mallet]
Put your hand on the block. Now, whack your fingers, hard!

[Raises mallet, then turns around]
But that would hurt my fingers, Babbit.
You are...
[Hypnotizes cat; he acts like a horse]
You are...
[Hypnotizes Babbit; he now wears a cowboy hat]
Duh, which way did they go? Which way did they go?
Them side-windin', bush-whackin' varmints went thataway. Head 'em off at the pass.

[Get on cat]
Hi ho Sliver, away!
[Babbit and the cat ride away, leaving Catsello with all the cheese]
Oh, I'm a bad boy.
Abracadabra, you are getting sleepy. Sleep... Sleep... That's it.
But I ain't sleepy, Babbit.

[Slaps Catsello]
You are so sleepy! Sleep! Sleep! Take that, and that!

[shouts]
Hey, Babbit!
[Quietly]
Cut it out, Babbit.
